text: oreāṟṟa sattayil ninn tanne niṅṅaḷe sr̥ṣṭiccuṇṭākkiyavanāṇavan. atil ninn tanne atinṟe iṇayēyuṁ avanuṇṭākki. avaḷēāṭeātt avan samādhānamaṭayuvān vēṇṭi. aṅṅane avan avaḷe prāpiccappēāḷ avaḷ laghuvāya oru (garbha) bhāraṁ vahiccu. enniṭṭ avaḷatumāyi naṭannu. tuṭarnn avaḷkk bhāraṁ kūṭiyappēāḷ avar iruvaruṁ avaruṭe rakṣitāvāya allāhuvēāṭ prārt'thiccu. ñaṅṅaḷkku nī oru nalla santānatte tarikayāṇeṅkil tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ nandiyuḷḷavaruṭe kūṭṭattilāyirikkuṁ
